DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim propose iHealth-T2D study : 1 . Determine whether intensive lifestyle modification v usual care reduces risk T2D ( primary endpoint ) amongst South Asians i. central obesity ; ii . prediabetes iii . overall ( central obesity / obesity ) . 2 . Investigate secondary endpoint , include health gain family member . Identify social , demographic environmental factor influence primary secondary endpoint . 3 . Carry health economic analysis lifestyle modification vs usual care prevention T2D Indian subcontinent Europe . Quantify cost-effectiveness screen waist circumference v HbA1c .
